## Block.goField() method

Navigate to field

**Signature:**

```typescript
goField(field: string, clazz?: string): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  field | string | The name of the field to navigate to. |
|  clazz | string | _(Optional)_ Optional parameter narrowing down to a specific field class. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise that resolves to a boolean indicating the success of the operation.
